name: Export OPML
author: Lopo Lencastre de Almeida - iPublicis.com

sections.description:
When you have a big blogroll and wan’t to make it public this comes handy. It will export your visible blogroll links into a valid OPML file on blog root and then you just have to create a link to it in your theme.

Translations

If you want to make a translation for your language, use the legal-info.pot included and (if you want) send me the files (just the .po and .mo ones) to dev@ipublicis.com for inclusion in plugin’s package. You’ll be credited, of course.

Credits for present translations

  • Portuguese translation made by Lopo Lencastre de Almeida (ipublicis)
sections.installation:
How to install the Export OPML and get it working in two easy steps:

  1. Upload /export-opml/ folder and its files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or just use the WordPress admin interface
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In Settings just click in Export OPML.
  4. Create a link to it.
  5. Repeat step 3 everytime you add or remove a visible link in your blogroll.

Also, check out the other WordPress plugins by the same author.
